title: Billionaire tech pioneer Nandan Nilekani takes on Amazon, Walmart in India - ThePrint
content: Billionaire tech pioneer Nandan Nilekani takes on Amazon, Walmart in India  ThePrint
description: Nilekani, who is the co-founder of Infosys, is helping govt build an open technology network that seeks to level the playing field for small merchants in India's $1 trillion retail market.
